name: ServiceWorkerRegistration.onupdatefound
description: The onupdatefound property of the ServiceWorkerRegistration interface is an EventListener property called whenever an event of type statechange is fired; it is fired any time the ServiceWorkerRegistration.installing property acquires a new service worker.

refs.name: Service Workers
refs.description: The definition of 'ServiceWorkerRegistration.onupdatefound' in the 'Service Workers' specification.
